AiEvaluationDefinition.name: Configure_Test
AiEvaluationDefinition.description: Tests for Configure plugin - metadata exploration and visualization

inputs.utterance: Show me a PlantUML diagram of the aquiva_os custom objects and their relationships

expectation.name: bot_response_rating
expectation.expectedValue: Provides a PlantUML diagram URL showing the relationships between aquiva_os custom objects

inputs.utterance: What Apex classes are in the aquiva_os namespace and what do they do?

expectation.name: bot_response_rating
expectation.expectedValue: Lists Apex classes including QueryRecordsWithSoql, CallRestApi, and explains their purpose

inputs.utterance: Describe the fields on the aquiva_os__Memory__c object

expectation.name: bot_response_rating
expectation.expectedValue: Describes the Memory__c object fields including Content__c and IsShared__c

inputs.utterance: What validation rules exist on the Account object in this org?

expectation.name: bot_response_rating
expectation.expectedValue: Describes any validation rules on Account or states that no validation rules exist
